title: Fastlane does not recognize utf8
body:
### New Issue Checklist - [x] Updated fastlane to the latest version - [x] I read the [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - [x] I read [docs.fastlane.tools](https://docs.fastlane.tools) - [x] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues) ### Issue Description `export LANG=en_US.UTF-8` works but `export LANG=en_US.utf8` does not which should work as well. ##### Complete output when running fastlane, including the stack trace and command used 
[âœ”] ðŸš€
[16:38:00]: fastlane detected a Gemfile in the current directory
[16:38:00]: however it seems like you don't use `bundle exec`

[16:38:00]:

### System Locale

| Error                       |
| --------------------------- |
| No Locale with UTF8 found ðŸš« |


### fastlane files:


`./fastlane/Fastfile`

```ruby
platform :ios do
  desc "Deploy ios app on the appstore"

  lane :deploy do
    match(type: "appstore")
    ionic(platform: 'ios')
    deliver(ipa: ENV['CORDOVA_IOS_RELEASE_BUILD_PATH'])
  end
end

platform :android do
  desc "Deploy android app on play store"

  lane :deploy do
    ionic(
      platform: 'android',
      keystore_path: './file.keystore',
      keystore_alias: 'alias',
      keystore_password: 'password'
    )
    supply(apk: './platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk')
  end
end

```



**No Appfile found**
